name: create_meeting_space
description: Create a new meeting space using the specified name and content details.

space_name.description: The name of the new space; must be a non-empty string.

meetingCode.description: A unique code for joining the meeting.

meetingUri.description: A URI to join the meeting.

accessType.description: The access level for the space.

space_content.description: A dictionary containing the new space's `meetingCode` (str), `meetingUri` (str), and `accessType` (str).

name: end_active_conference_in_space
description: Ends an active conference in a meeting space, if one exists.

name: get_conference_participant
description: Gets a participant using their resource name.

name: get_conference_record
description: Gets detailed information about a conference record by its ID.

name: get_conference_recording
description: Retrieves a conference recording by its ID.

name: get_conference_transcript
description: Gets a transcript by transcript ID.

name: get_meeting_space_details
description: Retrieves comprehensive details about a specific meeting space.

name.description: The name of the space to retrieve.

name: get_participant_session
description: Retrieves detailed information for a participant session by its ID.

name.description: The resource name (ID) of the session to retrieve.

name: get_transcript_entry
description: Gets a transcript entry by entry ID.

name.description: The resource name of the entry.

name: list_conference_participants
description: List participants of a conference record.

parent.description: The parent conference record's resource name.

pageSize.description: The maximum number of participants to return.

pageToken.description: A token for continued list pagination.

parent_conference_record.description: The ID of the parent conference record.

pageSize.description: The maximum number of recordings to return.

pageToken.description: A token for continued list pagination.

name: list_conference_records
description: Lists conference records with optional filtering and pagination, ordered by start time in descending order by default.

filter.description: An optional string to filter records, applied to each record's string representation.

pageToken.description: An optional token for pagination, representing the start index.

pageSize.description: Optional maximum number of records to return per page.

name: list_conference_transcript
description: Lists the transcripts of a conference.

parent_conference_record.description: The identifier of the parent conference record.

pageToken.description: The token for continued list pagination.

pageSize.description: The maximum number of transcripts to return.

name: list_participant_sessions
description: Lists all sessions for a specified participant, with optional filtering and pagination, sorted by join time in ascending order.

parent.description: The parent participant's resource name (participant ID).

filter.description: An optional filter string applied to the string representation of each session.

pageSize.description: The maximum number of sessions to return per page.

pageToken.description: A token for continued list pagination, representing the start index.

pageSize.description: The maximum number of entries to return.

pageToken.description: A token for continued list pagination.

name: update_meeting_space
description: Update a meeting space, modifying only the fields specified in the `update_mask`.

name.description: The name of the space to update.

update_mask.description: A dictionary mapping fields to their new values; known fields (e.g., 'id', 'meetingCode') must be strings, while arbitrary fields are also allowed, aligning with `SpaceUpdateMaskModel`.
